page.title: 11WIGAN ATHLETIC FOOTBALL CLUB
page.content:
{ Wigan Athletic,}based at Springfield Park, has become famous at last this year because they reached the final of the{Freight-Rover Trophy}at{Wembley. This is a cup competition for all Third and Fourth division clubs. They won{3-1}in the final against Brentford in a thrilling match enjoyed by both sets of supporters. This was particularly pleasing for the supporters as the club was in danger of relegation to Division Four before the new manager{Bryan Hamilton took over. They also won the{Isle of {Man Lancashire Cup}beating Blackburn Rovers 4-0 in the final.
**************************************
It has been a good sporting year for Wigan with both their{Rugby League}and {Football}teams winning at{Wembley.
